links: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..88
mathematica: z={}; current=1; Timing[ Do[ If[ Sin[ n ]<current, AppendTo[ z, current=Sin[ n ] ] ], {n, 30000} ] ]; zd = 1; lst = {}; Do[a = Sin@n; If[a > d, d = a; Print@n; AppendTo[lst, n]], {n, 111111111}]; lst (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 24 2007 *)
author: _Wouter Meeussen_
